products.title: Napa Blackout Mid Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Elegant and fashion forward, the napa blackout range is a luxuriously striped fabric. Choose between contemporary tones to get the perfect fit for your home. Napa blackout fabric offers complete light blocking properties, ensuring complete light control for your space. products.title: Marble Pvc Blackout Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The grandeur of marble is elegantly translated in fabric for the marble grey blackout roller blind. Etched with graceful greys and silvers on a white backdrop, this motif mirrors the organic veining of marble so you can enjoy the luxurious look on your windows. Presented on high quality blackout fabric, this on-trend roller blind is ideal for bathrooms and bedrooms to enhance peace and privacy. products.title: Palace Blackout Onyx Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Add some sumptuous drama into your living area, dining room or bedroom with palace blackout onyx grey roller blind which dresses up a window no end. On a soft, whispery grey background, the design features generous paisley swirls interspersed with curvaceous flowers to give a sophisticated look to any space. Made from blackout fabric, light wont travel into your room when the blind is closed. products.title: Loras Blackout Melody Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Loras blackout melody grey is an eye-catching electric roller blind that will add instant pretty appeal to your window of choice. With an electric operation system, it quickly opens and closes at the touch of a button. Featuring clusters of soft, white blossom and green leaves with bluebirds perching on branches its a serene design that will gain many compliments. This blind is made using a specialist blackout fabric so the light will stay firmly away when this blind is closed.

products.title: Whitby Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: For a smart and contemporary finish to any room, whitby blackout pvc stone grey electric blind in stone grey is an eye-popping display of a cityscape featuring simply drawn houses interspersed with leafy trees. Plus, it's made of moisture resistant fabric so it's easy to keep it clean. products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Roller Blind
products.description: This stylish japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous cherry blossom blackout serenity grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with pollergen a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.
